name: Farmer Brothers Company
description: Farmer Brothers Company is a leading national coffee roaster and distributor, dedicated to providing high-quality coffee, tea, and culinary products to foodservice establishments, restaurants, and retail outlets across the United States. Founded in 1912, the company has a rich history and a strong commitment to sourcing premium coffee beans from around the world. With an emphasis on sustainability and ethical sourcing practices, Farmer Brothers ensures that its products not only meet the highest standards of quality but also support the livelihoods of farmers. The company operates a state-of-the-art roasting facility and offers a diverse range of products, including gourmet coffees, teas, and a variety of foodservice solutions. Farmer Brothers also provides comprehensive support services, including equipment leasing, training, and marketing support to help customers enhance their coffee programs. The company’s mission is to be a trusted partner to its customers by delivering exceptional service and high-quality products that elevate the coffee experience. With a focus on innovation, Farmer Brothers is continuously exploring new flavors and brewing techniques to keep pace with evolving consumer preferences.
ceo: Devin W. H. H. N. H. Farmer

key_executives.name: Devin W. H. H. H. N. H. Farmer

seo.meta_title: Farmer Brothers Company | Quality Coffee and Tea

faq.answer: Farmer Brothers Company was founded in 1912.

faq.answer: Farmer Brothers offers gourmet coffees, teas, and a variety of foodservice solutions.

faq.answer: Devin W. H. H. H. N. H. Farmer is the CEO of Farmer Brothers Company.
